xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.linkcontract

Class LinkContractInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.container.impl.AbstractExtension<CONTAINER>
      • xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.AbstractInterceptor<MessagingContainer>
        • xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor.impl.linkcontract.LinkContractInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Extension<MessagingContainer>, Interceptor<MessagingContainer>, MessageInterceptor, OperationInterceptor, TargetInterceptor, Prototype<LinkContractInterceptor>

    public class LinkContractInterceptor
extends AbstractInterceptor<MessagingContainer>
implements MessageInterceptor, OperationInterceptor, TargetInterceptor, Prototype<LinkContractInterceptor>
    This interceptor enforces link contracts while a message is executed.
    Author:
    animesh
